docs.snippet: Russia will file a lawsuit against Ukraine, the Russian finance ministry said, after Kiev failed to repay a $3 billion Eurobond and $75 million in interest by Dec. 31....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia will file a lawsuit against Ukraine, the Russian finance ministry said, after Kiev failed to repay a $3 billion Eurobond and $75 million in interest by Dec. 31.
docs.abstract: Russia will file lawsuit against Ukraine, following failure of Kiev to repay $3 billion Eurobond and $75 million in interest by December 31.

headline.main: Russia to File Suit Against Ukraine for Nonpayment
headline.print_headline: Russia to File Suit Against Ukraine for Nonpayment

docs.snippet: Ukraine says it will introduce a wide-ranging ban on food imports from Russia in a week, a response to Russia's ban on food products from Ukraine....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ukraine says it will introduce a wide-ranging ban on food imports from Russia in a week, a response to Russia's ban on food products from Ukraine.

headline.main: Ukraine to Ban Array of Russian Food Imports

docs.snippet: A new appraisal names the United States as one of the threats to Russia's national security for the first time, a sign of how relations with the west have deteriorated in recent years....
docs.lead_paragraph: A new appraisal names the United States as one of the threats to Russia's national security for the first time, a sign of how relations with the west have deteriorated in recent years.

headline.main: Putin Names United States Among Threats in New Russian Security Strategy
headline.print_headline: Putin Names United States Among Threats in New Russian Security Strategy

docs.snippet: Officials said they had received a “very concrete tip” about a planned attack, but they reopened two transit hubs that had been evacuated....
docs.lead_paragraph: Officials said they had received a “very concrete tip” about a planned attack, but they reopened two transit hubs that had been evacuated.
docs.abstract: German officials defend their decision to close two transit hubs hours before midnight on New Year's Eve after receiving bomb threat from Islamic State; two stations have since reopened, although hundreds of police officers remain on guard.

headline.main: Munich on High Alert After New Year’s Eve Terrorism Threat
headline.print_headline: Decision to Shut Munich Transit Hubs Is Defended
